description.value:
Frequency once per day

You draw water from the environs, swirling it into a rough torrent around you to punish your foes. Each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] (or @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15 feet} if you're in a body of water) takes @Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. A creature that fails its save is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. At 17th level, the damage increases to 11d6.
